page.title: 10Pennar Park Holidays part 1
page.content: Pennar Park {holiday village}is situated where it is because it is built on the site of an old army camp whose function it was to protect the surrounding Haven.As the camp is water sport orientated the fact that it has the sea on 3 sides proved ideal.They receive an average 5 to 6 thousand visitors a year drawn mainly from the Welsh valleys and the Midlands with as many as 8 to 9 thousand in a good year.The average cost of a holiday there is Â£150 so the effect on the local economy is quite substantial.Water sport facilities include a sub-aqua lake plus a resident instructor to train divers and 12 moorings for boats to ferry diving clubs to suitable locations.We asked what there was to amuse children and were told:-Lots of entertainments,fancy dress parades,
